text: niscayanga, evaraite allah granthanlo avatarimpajesina sandesalanu daci, daniki baduluga alpalabham pondutaro, alanti varu tama kadupulanu kevalam agnito nimpukuntunnaru mariyu allah punarut'thana dinamuna varito matladadu mariyu varini sud'dhaparacadu mariyu variki badhakaramaina siksa untundi
